articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as Pakistan play South Africa in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: Pakistan bat first against South Africa

articles.description: Reaction to a mixed night for British sides in the Europa League and Europa Conference League before Premier League news conferences and build-up.
articles.title: European reaction & Premier League news conferences

articles.description: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe says the club are in "limbo" as they await confirmation from the Italian Football Federation of Sandro Tonali's 10-month ban.
articles.title: High chance Tonali can face Wolves, says Howe

articles.description: Saturday's El Clasico comes with both Real Madrid and Barcelona way off their best and papering over the cracks, writes Guillem Balague.
articles.title: Barca and Real 'papering over cracks' before El Clasico

articles.description: Pakistan skipper Babar Azam caught by Quinton de Kock on 50 off Tabraiz Shamsi following brilliant review by South Africa.
articles.title: 'What a review!' - Babar caught behind on 50

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Chelsea and Australia forward Sam Kerr, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2023 award.
articles.title: Is Kerr your Women's Footballer of the Year?

articles.description: Lark Atkin-Davies crosses for four of England's seven tries as the Red Roses defeat Canada 45-12 to maintain their 100% record in WXV1.
articles.title: Atkin-Davies scores four as England beat Canada

articles.description: England's World Cup is over, and their tournament has been a mess from the very start, with numerous issues affecting their title defence.
articles.title: 'A mess from the start - now England's World Cup is over'

articles.description: With a historic undisputed heavyweight title fight scheduled next, how seriously will Briton Tyson Fury take opponent Francis Ngannou in Saturday's crossover boxing bout?
articles.title: How seriously will Fury take Ngannou bout?

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on The Football Academy's Tash and Gabe from Jamie Johnson FC in this weekend's Premier League game predictions.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v TFA's Tash & Gabe from JJFC
